name: Tiered-Solar-System
author: thesixthroc
title: Organized Solar System [Updated!]
description:
Organizes the positions of solar system planets by 'tier', making it easier for modded planets to indicate where they fit in the game progression.

Tiers run from 0 (north of the star) anticlockwise to 6 (north-east of the star). Mods with no tier appear vertically below the sun. Please suggest a tier for them on Discord!
